Click the "bilibili" app icon, opening the app interface.
Click the 'Dynamic' tab located in the bottom navigation bar.
Click the "关注" tab to switch the displayed content.
Scroll down to view more posts in the community feed.
Scroll down to view more content on the page.
Scroll down through the feed to view more content.
Scroll down the page to view more content.
Scroll down to view more content in the app.
Scroll up to view more content in the current feed.
Click the '会员购' (Membership Purchase) icon in the bottom navigation bar to access member-exclusive deals and features.
